rows.translation: For the covenants (of security and safeguard enjoyed) by the Quraish,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.translation: Their covenants (covering) journeys by winter and summer,-
Let them adore the Lord of this House,

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
rows.translation: Who provides them with food against hunger, and with security against fear (of danger).
rows.transliteration: alladhī aṭ`amahum min jū`in wa-āmanahum min khawf
